name: Despike
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
Despike, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: Despike).

Removes 'spikes' from the 3D+time input dataset

    For complete details, see the `3dDespike Documentation.
    <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dDespike.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3ddespike.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file.
